data.footer_warm_prompt: Reminder: digital assets are innovative capital products, their price not stable and there’s high risks, please be aware of the risks before you make any decisions.

noticeInfo.title: Apollo Currency (APL) Deposit Address Change
noticeInfo.content: <p>Due to an Apollo Node Upgrade, users APL deposit addresses will be renewed. Please make sure you use your new deposit address when recharging your account. This will come into effect at approx. 9am UTC Tuesday 27th July. This will only effect the deposit address for Apollo Currency (APL).</p>
